full_summary:
# Government Tender Notice
## Solicitation # WS4104054309
### Tractor Trailer Rental

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
**Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Category:** Service/Supply Agreement
**Geographic Region:** Nova Scotia, Canada
**Organization:** Government of Canada, Department of Public Works and Government Services
**Supported by:** Department of National Defence

*Details*

This Solicitation is for a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the rental of Highway Tractor Trailers to support the Department of National Defence.
The Standing Offer will be valid for a term of one year, with two optional one-year periods.
The Solicitation is structured as a "Request for Standing Offer," meaning the Offeror must be prepared to provide the required services on a "as and when requested" basis.
The basis of selection for this Solicitation is the lowest evaluated price.

## Solicitation Requirements

* The Standing Offer will include rental of Highway Tractor Trailers on an "as and when requested" basis to support the Department of National Defence.
* The Offeror must provide one Highway Tractor Trailer, with specifications outlined in the solicitation documentation.
* The Standing Offer will be valid for a term of one year, with two optional one-year periods.
* The Offeror must be prepared to provide services on a "as and when requested" basis.

## Solicitation Documents

* Solicitation documents are available on the SAP Ariba platform.
* Offerors must log in to their SAP Ariba account to access the solicitation documents.
* The full Request for Individual Standing Offer (RISO) and annexes can be downloaded when logged into the SAP Ariba account.

## Contact Information
